name: gmail-accounts
title: Gmail Accounts
description: Quickly access your Gmail accounts in Chrome (requires Google Chrome)
author: lachero

commands.name: list-accounts
commands.title: List Gmail Accounts
commands.description: Lists all Gmail accounts in Chrome
commands.subtitle: Gmail

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
